events.title: Join our Slack Community
events.description: New to Slack? Check out this page to get some tips on getting started.

events.title: Optional User Engagement Workshop in Chicago
events.description: Join an incredible group of TOP participants in an interactive workshop to get a deeper understanding of how the program will unfold, and a preview of the next 12 weeks.

events.title: Problem Statement Orientation
events.description: Dive into the weeds about your problem statement, and get more information about the goals of each challenge.

events.title: User Research
events.description: In parallel to learning about the problem statements, learn more about the communities that are most affected by them and what their experiences, needs and challenges are like.

events.title: User Research Milestone
events.description: Teams join the virtual milestone to share findings from user research that will inform the design of their product, and connect with user advocates to get feedback

events.title: User Research + Data Exploration
events.description: Teams continue to conduct user research and begin to explore available data sets

events.title: Continue Data Exploration
events.description: Teams continue to explore available data sets

events.title: Data Dive Milestone
events.description: Teams join the virtual milestone to hear from data stewards and ask questions on available data sets

events.title: Data Exploration & Product Development
events.description: Teams explore available data sets, connect with data stewards, and begin scoping/developing products

events.title: Alpha Demo Milestone
events.description: Participants come together for a virtual demo of the tools in progress. Teams share concepts and wireframes, and get feedback from user advocates, data stewards, and product experts.

events.title: Product Development & User Testing
events.description: Teams continue building products and collect user feedback

events.title: Beta Demo Milestone
events.description: Teams come together to showcase and share feedback on more mature versions of their products. Typically, tools have reached at least wireframes and have some functioning features.

events.title: Product Development & User Testing
events.description: Teams continue building products and conduct user testing

events.title: Present final MVPs
events.description: Teams share MVP with TOP team prior to collective rollout
